verses.verse: And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> when Isaac <S%H3327><s%> was old, <S%H2204><s%> and his eyes <S%H5869><s%> were dim, <S%H3543><s%> so that he could not see, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7200><s%> he called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H853><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> his eldest <S%H1419><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, My son: <S%H1121><s%> and he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Behold, <S%H2009><s%> here am I.
And he said, <S%H559><s%> Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> I am old, <S%H2204><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> of my death: <S%H4194><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore take, <S%H5375><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> thy weapons, <S%H3627><s%> thy quiver <S%H8522><s%> and thy bow, <S%H7198><s%> and go out <S%H3318><s%> to the field, <S%H7704><s%> and take <S%H6679><s%> me some venison; <S%H6718><s%>

And make <S%H6213><s%> me savory meat, <S%H4303><s%> such as <S%H834><s%> I love, <S%H157><s%> and bring <S%H935><s%> it to me, that I may eat; <S%H398><s%> that <S%H5668><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> thee before <S%H2962><s%> I die. <S%H4191><s%>

And Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> when Isaac <S%H3327><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%> And Esau <S%H6215><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to the field <S%H7704><s%> to hunt <S%H6679><s%> for venison, <S%H6718><s%> and to bring <S%H935><s%> it.

And Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> her son, <S%H1121><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy father <S%H1><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> thy brother, <S%H251><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Bring <S%H935><s%> me venison, <S%H6718><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> me savory meat, <S%H4303><s%> that I may eat, <S%H398><s%> and bless <S%H1288><s%> thee before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> my death. <S%H4194><s%>
Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, my son, <S%H1121><s%> obey <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%> according to that which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H589><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee.

Go <S%H1980><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the flock, <S%H6629><s%> and fetch <S%H3947><s%> me from thence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> kids <S%H1423><s%> of the goats; <S%H5795><s%> and I will make <S%H6213><s%> them savory meat <S%H4303><s%> for thy father, <S%H1><s%> such as <S%H834><s%> he loveth: <S%H157><s%>

And thou shalt bring <S%H935><s%> it to thy father, <S%H1><s%> that he may eat, <S%H398><s%> and that <S%H5668><s%> <S%H834><s%> he may bless <S%H1288><s%> thee before <S%H6440><s%> his death. <S%H4194><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> his mother, <S%H517><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> my brother <S%H251><s%> is a hairy <S%H8163><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> and I <S%H595><s%> am a smooth <S%H2509><s%> man: <S%H376><s%>

My father <S%H1><s%> peradventure <S%H194><s%> will feel <S%H4959><s%> me, and I shall seem <S%H1961><s%> to him <S%H5869><s%> as a deceiver; <S%H8591><s%> and I shall bring <S%H935><s%> a curse <S%H7045><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> me, and not <S%H3808><s%> a blessing. <S%H1293><s%>

And his mother <S%H517><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Upon <S%H5921><s%> me be thy curse, <S%H7045><s%> my son: <S%H1121><s%> only <S%H389><s%> obey <S%H8085><s%> my voice, <S%H6963><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> fetch <S%H3947><s%> me them.

And he went, <S%H1980><s%> and fetched, <S%H3947><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> them to his mother: <S%H517><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> savory meat, <S%H4303><s%> such as <S%H834><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> loved. <S%H157><s%>

And Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> goodly <S%H2530><s%> raiment <S%H899><s%> of her eldest <S%H1419><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> Esau, <S%H6215><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were with <S%H854><s%> her in the house, <S%H1004><s%> and put them upon <S%H3847><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> her younger <S%H6996><s%> son: <S%H1121><s%>

And she put <S%H3847><s%> the skins <S%H5785><s%> of the kids <S%H1423><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> his hands, <S%H3027><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the smooth <S%H2513><s%> of his neck: <S%H6677><s%>

And she gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the savory meat <S%H4303><s%> and the bread, <S%H3899><s%> which <S%H834><s%> she had prepared, <S%H6213><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of her son <S%H1121><s%> Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

And he came <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> My father: <S%H1><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> Here <S%H2009><s%> am I; who <S%H4310><s%> art thou, <S%H859><s%> my son? <S%H1121><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> I <S%H595><s%> am Esau <S%H6215><s%> thy firstborn; <S%H1060><s%> I have done <S%H6213><s%> according as <S%H834><s%> thou biddest <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413><s%> me: arise, <S%H6965><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> sit <S%H3427><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> of my venison, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6718><s%> that <S%H5668><s%> thy soul <S%H5315><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> me.

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> How <S%H4100><s%> is it <S%H2088><s%> that thou hast found <S%H4672><s%> it so quickly, <S%H4116><s%> my son? <S%H1121><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> brought <S%H7136><s%> it to <S%H6440><s%> me.

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> Come near, <S%H5066><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> that I may feel <S%H4184><s%> thee, my son, <S%H1121><s%> whether thou <S%H859><s%> be my very <S%H2088><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> or <S%H518><s%> not. <S%H3808><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> went near <S%H5066><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his father; <S%H1><s%> and he felt <S%H4959><s%> him, and said, <S%H559><s%> The voice <S%H6963><s%> is Jacob's <S%H3290><s%> voice, <S%H6963><s%> but the hands <S%H3027><s%> are the hands <S%H3027><s%> of Esau. <S%H6215><s%>

And he discerned <S%H5234><s%> him not, <S%H3808><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> his hands <S%H3027><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> hairy, <S%H8163><s%> as his brother <S%H251><s%> Esau's <S%H6215><s%> hands: <S%H3027><s%> so he blessed <S%H1288><s%> him.
And he said, <S%H559><s%> Art thou <S%H859><s%> my very <S%H2088><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> Esau? <S%H6215><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am.

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Bring it near <S%H5066><s%> to me, and I will eat <S%H398><s%> of my son's <S%H1121><s%> venison, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6718><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> thee. And he brought it near <S%H5066><s%> to him, and he did eat: <S%H398><s%> and he brought <S%H935><s%> him wine, <S%H3196><s%> and he drank. <S%H8354><s%>
And his father <S%H1><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Come near <S%H5066><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> and kiss <S%H5401><s%> me, my son. <S%H1121><s%>

And he came near, <S%H5066><s%> and kissed <S%H5401><s%> him: and he smelled <S%H7306><s%> <S%H853><s%> the smell <S%H7381><s%> of his raiment, <S%H899><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> him, and said, <S%H559><s%> See, <S%H7200><s%> the smell <S%H7381><s%> of my son <S%H1121><s%> is as the smell <S%H7381><s%> of a field <S%H7704><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath blessed: <S%H1288><s%>

Therefore God <S%H430><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> thee of the dew <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2919><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and the fatness <S%H4924><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and plenty <S%H7230><s%> of corn <S%H1715><s%> and wine: <S%H8492><s%>

Let people <S%H5971><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> thee, and nations <S%H3816><s%> bow down <S%H7812><s%> to thee: be <S%H1933><s%> lord <S%H1376><s%> over thy brethren, <S%H251><s%> and let thy mother's <S%H517><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> bow down <S%H7812><s%> to thee: cursed <S%H779><s%> be every one that curseth <S%H779><s%> thee, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> be he that blesseth <S%H1288><s%> thee.

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> as soon as <S%H834><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of blessing <S%H1288><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> yet <S%H389><s%> scarce gone out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H3318><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the presence <S%H6440><s%> of Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> that Esau <S%H6215><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> came in <S%H935><s%> from his hunting. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6718><s%>

And he <S%H1931><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> had made <S%H6213><s%> savory meat, <S%H4303><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> it unto his father, <S%H1><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto his father, <S%H1><s%> Let my father <S%H1><s%> arise, <S%H6965><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> of his son's <S%H1121><s%> venison, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6718><s%> that <S%H5668><s%> thy soul <S%H5315><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> me.

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Who <S%H4310><s%> art thou? <S%H859><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am thy son, <S%H1121><s%> thy firstborn <S%H1060><s%> Esau. <S%H6215><s%>

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> trembled <S%H2729><s%> very exceedingly, <S%H2731><s%> <S%H1419><s%> <S%H5704><s%> <S%H3966><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Who? <S%H4310><s%> where <S%H645><s%> is he <S%H1931><s%> that hath taken <S%H6679><s%> venison, <S%H6718><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> it me, and I have eaten <S%H398><s%> of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> before <S%H2962><s%> thou camest, <S%H935><s%> and have blessed <S%H1288><s%> him? yea, <S%H1571><s%> and he shall be <S%H1961><s%> blessed. <S%H1288><s%>

And when Esau <S%H6215><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of his father, <S%H1><s%> he cried <S%H6817><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> and <S%H5704><s%> exceeding <S%H3966><s%> bitter <S%H4751><s%> cry, <S%H6818><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto his father, <S%H1><s%> Bless <S%H1288><s%> me, even me <S%H589><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> O my father. <S%H1><s%>
And he said, <S%H559><s%> Thy brother <S%H251><s%> came <S%H935><s%> with subtlety, <S%H4820><s%> and hath taken away <S%H3947><s%> thy blessing. <S%H1293><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Is not he rightly <S%H3588><s%> named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> Jacob? <S%H3290><s%> for he hath supplanted <S%H6117><s%> me these <S%H2088><s%> two times: <S%H6471><s%> he took away <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> my birthright; <S%H1062><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> he hath taken away <S%H3947><s%> my blessing. <S%H1293><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> Hast thou not <S%H3808><s%> reserved <S%H680><s%> a blessing <S%H1293><s%> for me?

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto Esau, <S%H6215><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I have made <S%H7760><s%> him thy lord, <S%H1376><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his brethren <S%H251><s%> have I given <S%H5414><s%> to him for servants; <S%H5650><s%> and with corn <S%H1715><s%> and wine <S%H8492><s%> have I sustained <S%H5564><s%> him: and what <S%H4100><s%> shall I do <S%H6213><s%> now <S%H645><s%> unto thee, my son? <S%H1121><s%>

And Esau <S%H6215><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> Hast thou but one <S%H259><s%> blessing, <S%H1293><s%> my father? <S%H1><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> me, even me <S%H589><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> O my father. <S%H1><s%> And Esau <S%H6215><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> and wept. <S%H1058><s%>

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Behold, <S%H2009><s%> thy dwelling <S%H4186><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> the fatness <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4924><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and of the dew <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2919><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> from above; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5920><s%>

And by <S%H5921><s%> thy sword <S%H2719><s%> shalt thou live, <S%H2421><s%> and shalt serve <S%H5647><s%> thy brother; <S%H251><s%> and it shall come to pass <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H834><s%> thou shalt have the dominion, <S%H7300><s%> that thou shalt break <S%H6561><s%> his yoke <S%H5923><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> thy neck. <S%H6677><s%>

And Esau <S%H6215><s%> hated <S%H7852><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> because of <S%H5921><s%> the blessing <S%H1293><s%> wherewith <S%H834><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> him: and Esau <S%H6215><s%> said <S%H559><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> The days <S%H3117><s%> of mourning <S%H60><s%> for my father <S%H1><s%> are at hand; <S%H7126><s%> then will I slay <S%H2026><s%> <S%H853><s%> my brother <S%H251><s%> Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

And <S%H853><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> her elder <S%H1419><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> were told <S%H5046><s%> to Rebekah: <S%H7259><s%> and she sent <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> her younger <S%H6996><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Behold, <S%H2009><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%> Esau, <S%H6215><s%> as touching thee, doth comfort himself, <S%H5162><s%> purposing to kill <S%H2026><s%> thee.

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, my son, <S%H1121><s%> obey <S%H8085><s%> my voice; <S%H6963><s%> and arise, <S%H6965><s%> flee <S%H1272><s%> thou to <S%H413><s%> Laban <S%H3837><s%> my brother <S%H251><s%> to Haran; <S%H2771><s%>
And tarry <S%H3427><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him a few <S%H259><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> thy brother's <S%H251><s%> fury <S%H2534><s%> turn away; <S%H7725><s%>

Until <S%H5704><s%> thy brother's <S%H251><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> turn away <S%H7725><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> thee, and he forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H853><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> thou hast done <S%H6213><s%> to him: then I will send, <S%H7971><s%> and fetch <S%H3947><s%> thee from thence: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> should I be deprived <S%H7921><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> of you both <S%H8147><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> day? <S%H3117><s%>

And Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> I am weary <S%H6973><s%> of my life <S%H2416><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Heth: <S%H2845><s%> if <S%H518><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> of the daughters <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1323><s%> of Heth, <S%H2845><s%> such as these <S%H428><s%> which are of the daughters <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1323><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> what good <S%H4100><s%> shall my life <S%H2416><s%> do me?
